testcase.name: test_reduce_sensitivity_from_high_to_medium

failure.message:
AssertionError: Previous sensitivity should be high assert 'medium' == 'high'
- high + medium

testcase.failure: tests/test_adaptive_alerts.py:393: in test_reduce_sensitivity_from_high_to_medium assert data.get('previousSensitivity') == 'high', "Previous sensitivity should be high" E AssertionError: Previous sensitivity should be high E assert 'medium' == 'high' E E - high E + medium

testcase.name: test_reduce_sensitivity_from_medium_to_low

- medium + low
